content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Greetings Haoyu Wang. As Peter Schmidt, I appreciate your interest in our apartment in Duisburg. Let's focus on discussing the rental price during our negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given that the apartment is in the city center and close to all important facilities, I believe a reasonable price is 850 euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you for your proposal, Haoyu Wang. However, considering the high demand and exceptional location, I prefer a slightly higher price. 'I agree to the price of 900 Euro!' TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
